name: You Are Not The Player
description:
In this Platformer Game You Place the Platforms Mid Air So The Player Won't Die

Its Simple And Fun There Are 10 Randomly Generated Levels

Controls:

LeftClick = place platform (or bumper on Super hard mode)

Tip:

I found the most enjoyable setting to be hard mode

Credits Go To:

Music:

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

Player-assets:

https://jesse-m.itch.io/jungle-pack

Btw My GitHub Page:

https://github.com/ChromiumOS-Guy

Oh and If You Are On Mobile You Can't Play I Mean You Can Try To Play
